comments.text:
Created attachment 566498
FFbug.PNG

User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Build ID: 20110928134238

Steps to reproduce:

In a mapsurvey application we created I was creating a line on a map(digitizing).


Actual results:

When I click and draw my line in the webmap(we use OpenLayers for this)I realize that a descriptive tooltip appears every no and again when I create the nodes for my line. The text that´s shown does not belong to the object I´m currently viewing but it has remembered  the last tooltip and displays this instead. 


Expected results:

The tooltip should not have appeared at all.

Steps to reproduce:

In a mapsurvey application we created I was creating a line on a map(digitizing).


Actual results:

When I click and draw my line in the webmap(we use OpenLayers for this)I realize that a descriptive tooltip appears every no and again when I create the nodes for my line. The text that´s shown does not belong to the object I´m currently viewing but it has remembered  the last tooltip and displays this instead.
